author: rdonkin
msg: Added test case for patch but patch broke some other test cases so wasn't committed. A proper fix could be involved and isn't high on my list of priorities at the moment. Thought that i should keep the test case around, though.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added method which allows class log to be set programatically.

author: rdonkin
msg: Patch ensures that strategies are correctly applied for descriptors created by an <addDefaults/> in a .betwixt file.  Submitted by Calvin Yu.

author: rdonkin
msg: Modified id generation so that alphabetic id's are allowed (in addition to numeric ones)

author: jstrachan
msg: created adder methods on the test CustomerBean so that all the array based properties now round trip to XML and back again fine.
Also added more rigorous testing that this is the case.
Thanks go to Diego Tognola for bringing this up and providing the code for the adder methods.
